sources.title: Flesh And Fury (1952) Tony Curtis, Jan Sterling, Mona Freeman
sources.description: Flesh and Fury is a 1952 American FILM NOlR drama sport film directed by Joseph Pevney and starring Tony Curtis, Jan Sterling and Mona Freeman. Â  You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia .

metadata.Plot: Deaf boxer Paul Callan captures the interest of gold-digging blonde Sonya Bartow and retired fight manager 'Pop' Richardson. For a time, Sonya has the upper hand with Paul, but ultimately a rival appears in the shape of upper-crust reporter Ann Hollis. With a 3-way fight under way for influence over Paul, he takes matters into his own hands, but learns that getting what he wanted isn't necessarily a happy ending.
metadata.Actors: Tony Curtis, Jan Sterling, Mona Freeman
